tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilQuality (
    zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    nutrient_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    pH_level FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE nutrient_levels (
    nutrient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    nutrient_name STRING,
    nitrogen_level FLOAT,
    phosphorus_level FLOAT,
    potassium_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE NutrientLevels (
   nutrient_id INT,
   zone_id INT,
   nitrogen_level FLOAT,
   phosphorus_level FLOAT,
   potassium_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE NutrientReadings (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT REFERENCES SoilSensors(sensor_id) NOT NULL,
  nutrient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  reading_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  reading_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
